galleryHeader.bestDealText: Get the best deal and purchase the entire collection!

privateGallery.title: Welcome to your private gallery!
privateGallery.p1: You can watch and enjoy the pictures of your last trip in <1>{{city}}</1>, <3>{{country}}</3>.
privateGallery.p2: Now, review the gallery and select the pictures you want to buy and keep forever. The more you buy, the more the price decreases.
privateGallery.p3: I really thank you {{modelName}} because you help me living and i hope you will find it incredible !

landingPage.title: Get your travel memories!
landingPage.description: Did you just meet one of our photographers on the street? Gain access to the photos they took of you by entering the ID you received in your inbox!
landingPage.inputPlaceholder: Enter the identifier of your gallery
